properties.name: barbarus.paramters.view-id
properties.description: Barbarus ViewId paramter gathered from the Authentication Form.

properties.name: barbarus.paramters.username
properties.description: Barbarus Username paramter gathered from the Authentication Form.

properties.name: barbarus.paramters.password
properties.description: Barbarus Password paramter gathered from the Authentication Form.

properties.name: barbarus.paramters.jwt-token
properties.description: Barbarus JwtToken paramter name sent to the front when the authentication is successful.

properties.name: barbaurs.paramters.token-validity-in-millis
properties.description: Barbarus JWT Token validity in millis.

properties.name: barbaurs.paramters.jwt-secret-key
properties.description: Barbarus JWT Secret Key. Default value must change.

properties.name: barbaurs.paramters.authorities-key
properties.description: Authorities key used to map actual security strategy to Barbarus.
